text: A k’u ba phetele pale ea Nooe, mohla a neng a bolella batho ba habo a re: “Oho batho ba heso! Haeba bolulo ba ka har’a lona ba nakoana le tsona likhopotso tsa ka ho lona le lits’enolo tsa Allah ke likhopiso ho lona, ‘na ke behile ts’epo ea ka ho Allah. Kahoo ralang holim’a litumellano tsa lona mahareng a lona le Batlatsetsi ba lona. Empa le hlokomele hore morero oa lona o se le nts’ofalle oa khopama. Joale e be lea nkahlola, ha le mphe phomolo
